text: He dumped her for another woman and then took her back on the eye - popping season 22 finale of The Bachelor. But Arie Luyendyk Jr. and Lauren Burnham seem to have put their trouble behind them, kissing passionately on a Barcelona sidewalk while holidaying there Thursday. They had previously been on vacation to Iceland, where Arie's Instagram Story included a snapshot of his 25 - year - old showing off her derriere in a skimpy swimsuit as she floated in a hot spring.
